api_name: Get data center 6 detail
description: This API is to get data center detail of a specific data center with id 6 that is configured in SPOG tool. Along with authorization the API need dc_id as a parameter. In case someone want to det detail of data center with id 6 he can use this api to get the details

api_name: Get specific data center detail
description: You can use this API to fetch the details of a particular data centre with id 3 configured in SPOG. It requires an Authorization token and the 3 to provide the requested information.

api_name: Provide me details of data center with id 5
description: This API is meant for obtaining details about a data centre using its unique id 5, as managed in the SPOG system. Authorization and 5 are mandatory inputs for accessing the data.

api_name: Get all load run profiles
description: This API is ment for getting all the load run profiles that exist in the SPOG system or SPOG tool. It needs accept header if type application/json along with Authorization key.

api_name: Show all run profiles
description: This API allows you to fetch all load run profiles stored in the SPOG system or tool. It requires an authorization key along with an "accept" header set to "application/json."

api_name: All load run profiles.
description: With this API, you can get all available load run profiles from the SPOG system or tool. Be sure to provide the required authorization key and set the "accept" header to "application/json."

api_name: Create user pnarah@maildummy.com with team id 10
description: Use this API to create a user in SPOG. It needs user email id e.g pnarah@maildummy.com and the team that user belongs e.g 10. The teamId should be already existing in the system to successfully add the user.
